data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 3 believers living in the state of Čaška. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Čaška, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 3 believers in Čaška, North Macedonia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Čaška, North Macedonia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Čaška with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Albanian, Macedonian people might believe through him.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Čaška, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Čaška, North Macedonia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Čaška, North Macedonia has a population of 1,500.

We estimate Čaška has 3 people who might know Jesus, 927 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 570 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 499 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Čaška, North Macedonia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
